mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysShopBrndFeeHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ SHOP_ID , ERP_BRND_ID , FEE_HIST_SECT_CD , HIST_BEG_DT , HIST_END_DT , MOD_BF_SHOP_FEE_SECT_CD , MOD_BF_SHOP_FEE_AMT , MOD_BF_SHOP_FEE_RT , MOD_AF_SHOP_FEE_SECT_CD , MOD_AF_SHOP_FEE_AMT , MOD_AF_SHOP_FEE_RT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_SHOP_BRND_FEE_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ERP_BRND_ID = #{erpBrndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FEE_HIST_SECT_CD = #{feeHistSectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HIST_BEG_DT = #{histBegDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
